properties.headline: Avalanche Warning issued January 8 at 4:50AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
The following message is transmitted at the request of the Forest
Service Idaho Panhandle Avalanche Center Sandpoint ID

...The Forest Service Idaho Panhandle Avalanche Center Sandpoint
ID has issued an extension to the current a Backcountry Avalanche
Warning...

* Timing...In effect until 6 AM MST Thursday

* Affected Area...St. Regis Basin in Lookout Pass Zone,
Kootenay/Cabinet MT Zone.

* Avalanche Danger...The avalanche danger is HIGH and will remain
high for the extended period.

* Reason/Impacts...Recent heavy snow combined with wind will
result in widespread avalanche activity. Expect unstable snow
conditions in the backcountry.
properties.instruction:
Very dangerous avalanche conditions. Travel on and below steep
slopes is not recommended. Avalanches may run long distances.

Consult http://www.idahopanhandleavalanche.org for more detailed
information.

Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the
coverage area of any Avalanche Center.
